GV05isupsb_u:228: tena pātreṇeva apidhānabhūtena satyasyaivādityamaṇḍalasthasya brāhmaṇo 'pihitam ācchāditaṃ mukhaṃ dvāram /
GV05isupsb_u:229_0: tattvaṃ he pūṣannapāvṛṇvapasāraya satyasya upāsanātsatyaṃ dharmo yasya mama so 'haṃ
GV05isupsb_u:229_1: satyadharmā tasmai mahyamathavā yathābhūtasya dharmasyānuṣṭhātre dṛṣṭaye tava satyātmana
GV05isupsb_u:230: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:231: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi // IsUp_16 //
GV05isupsb_u:232: he pūṣan/ jagataḥ poṣaṇātpūṣā ravistathaika eva ṛṣati gacchati ityekarṣiḥ-- he ekarṣe/
GV05isupsb_u:234: tathā raśmīnāṃ prāṇānāṃ rasānāñca svīkaraṇāt sūryaḥ-- he sūrya/
GV05isupsb_u:238: yatte tava rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam atyantaśobhanaṃ tatte tavātmanaḥ prasādāt paśyāmi /
GV05isupsb_u:239_0: kiñcāhaṃ na tu tvāṃ bhṛtyavadyāce yo 'sāvādityamaṇḍalastho vyāhṛtyavayavaḥ puruṣaḥ
GV05isupsb_u:239_1: puruṣākāratvātpūrṇaṃ vānena prāṇabuddhayātmanā jagatsamastamiti puruṣaḥ puri śayanādvā
GV05isupsb_u:240: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram /
GV05isupsb_u:241: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara // IsUp_17 //
GV05isupsb_u:242: athedānīṃ mama mariṣyato vāyuḥ prāṇo 'dhyātmaparicchedaṃ hitvādhidaivatātmānaṃ sarvātmakamanilamamṛtaṃ sūtrātmānaṃ pratipadyatāmiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:248: smara yanmama smartavyaṃ tasya kālo 'yaṃ pratyupasthito 'taḥ smara /
GV05isupsb_u:249: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ bhāvitaṃ kṛtamagne smara yanmayā bālyaprabhṛtyanuṣṭhitaṃ karma tacca smara /
GV05isupsb_u:252: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV05isupsb_u:253: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema // IsUp_18 //
GV05isupsb_u:254: he agne/ naya gamaya supathā śobhanena mārgeṇa /
GV05isupsb_u:256: nirviṇṇo 'haṃ dakṣiṇena mārgeṇa gatāgatalakṣaṇenāto yāce tvāṃ punaḥ punargamanāgamanavarjitena śobhanena pathā naya /
GV05isupsb_u:260: kiñca yuyodhi viyojaya vināśaya asmadasmatto juhurāṇaṃ kuṭilaṃ vañcanātmakamenaḥ pāpam /
GV05isupsb_u:261: tato vayaṃ viśuddhāḥ santa iṣṭaṃ prāpsyāma ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:262: kintu vayamidānīṃ te na śaknumaḥ paricaryāṃ kartum /
GV05isupsb_u:263: bhūyiṣṭhāṃ bahutarāṃ te tubhyaṃ nama uktiṃ namaskāravacanaṃ vidhema namaskāreṇa paricarema ityarthaḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:274: yathā ca na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtānīti śāstrādavagataṃ punaḥ śāstreṇaiva bādhyate 'dhvare paśuṃ hiṃsyāditi /
GV05isupsb_u:277: na“dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā“(ka.u.1 / 2 / 4) iti śruteḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:278: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ceti vacanādavirodha iti cet?
GV05isupsb_u:284_0: na hyagniruṣṇaḥ prakāśaśceti vijñānotpattau yasminnāśraye tadutpannaṃ tasminnevāśraye
GV05isupsb_u:284_1: śīto 'gniraprakāśo vetyavidyāyā utpattirnāpi saṃśayo 'jñānaṃ vā“yasmin sarvāṇi bhūtānyātmaivābhūdvijānataḥ /
GV05isupsb_u:285: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ“(ī.u.7)
GV05isupsb_u:290: tasmādupāsanayā samuccayo na paramātmavijñāneneti yathāsmābhirvyākhyāta eva mantrāṇāmartha ityuparamyate //IsUpBh_18//
